typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string,
	Product_Group as string
}
source(output(
		{Source Metric} as string,
		{Period Date} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{Species Common Name} as string,
		{Product Common Name} as string,
		Currency as string,
		UOM as string,
		Market as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string,
		Indicator as string,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		{Origin Port Country} as string,
		{Origin Port Region} as string,
		{Origin Port} as string,
		{Destination Port Country} as string,
		{Destination Port Region} as string,
		{Destination Port} as string,
		{Vessel Name} as string,
		Low as string,
		High as string,
		Average as string,
		Spot as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Product_Id as integer,
		Product_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Product_Global_Grade as string,
		Product_Common_Name as string,
		Product_Desc as string,
		Product_Group as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Species_Common_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Product_Id]\n      ,[Product_Code]\n      ,[Product_Type]\n      ,[Product_Global_Grade]\n      ,[Product_Common_Name]\n      ,[Product_Desc]\n      ,[Product_Group]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Product]\nWHERE [Product_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimProductLkp
source(output(
		Species_ID as integer,
		Species_Code as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Common_Name as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_ID]\n      ,[Species_Code]\n      ,[Genus]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\n      ,[Species_Group]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]\nWHERE [Species_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimSpeciesLkp
FilterProcessGroup select(mapColumn(
		Product_Id_Lkp = Product_Id,
		Product_Code_Lkp = Product_Code,
		Product_Type_Lkp = Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp = Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Common_Name_Lkp = Product_Common_Name,
		Product_Desc_Lkp = Product_Desc,
		Product_Group_Lkp = Product_Group,
		GL_Code_Lkp = GL_Code,
		Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimProductLkp
GetUniqueSpicesProductCombination derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName,
		Insert_DateTime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> DataTransformation
DatamartDimSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_ID_Lkp = Species_ID,
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Genus_Lkp = Genus,
		Species_Lkp = Species,
		Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name,
		Species_Group_Lkp = Species_Group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
DataTransformation, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup({Species Common Name} == Species_Common_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimSpecies
LookupDimSpecies, SelectDimProductLkp lookup({Product Common Name} == Product_Common_Name_Lkp
	&& {Species Common Name} == Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimProduct
DatamartDimProductLkp filter(Product_Group == $Product_Group) ~> FilterProcessGroup
RemoveBlankSpeciesProduct aggregate(groupBy({Species Common Name},
		{Product Common Name}),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> GetUniqueSpicesProductCombination
LookupDimProduct split(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp),
	isNull(Product_Id_Lkp) || (not(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp)) && notEquals(Species_Common_Name_Lkp, Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp)),
	disjoint: true) ~> SplitSpeciesProductDetails@(Species, Product)
DerivedSpeciesDetails select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code,
		Genus,
		Species,
		Species_Common_Name = {Species Common Name},
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesOutput
AddPoductDetails select(mapColumn(
		Product_Code,
		Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Common_Name = {Product Common Name},
		Product_Desc,
		Product_Group,
		GL_Code,
		Species_Common_Name = {Species Common Name},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductOutput
SplitSpeciesProductDetails@Product derive(Product_Group = $Product_Group,
		Product_Code = 'Undefined',
		Product_Type = 'Undefined',
		Product_Global_Grade = 'Undefined',
		Product_Desc = 'Undefined',
		GL_Code = 'Undefined') ~> AddPoductDetails
ReadSource filter(not(isNull({Species Common Name})) && not(isNull({Product Common Name}))) ~> RemoveBlankSpeciesProduct
SplitSpeciesProductDetails@Species derive(Species_Code = 'Undefined',
		Genus = 'Undefined',
		Species = 'Undefined',
		Species_Group = 'Undefined') ~> DerivedSpeciesDetails
SelectSpeciesOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Species_Code,
		Genus,
		Species,
		Species_Common_Name,
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertNewSpeciesDim
SelectProductOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Product_Code,
		Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Common_Name,
		Product_Desc,
		Product_Group,
		GL_Code,
		Species_Common_Name,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertNewProductDim

		{Origin Port Region} as string,
		{Origin Port} as string,

		{Destination Port Region} as string,

		Product_Common_Name as string,
		Product_Desc as string,

		Species_Common_Name as string
	),

	validateSchema: false,

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Product_Id]\n      ,[Product_Code]\n      ,[Product_Type]\n      ,[Product_Global_Grade]\n      ,[Product_Common_Name]\n      ,[Product_Desc]\n      ,[Product_Group]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Product]\nWHERE [Product_Id] != -1',

source(output(
		Species_ID as integer,
		Species_Code as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Common_Name as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_ID]\n      ,[Species_Code]\n      ,[Genus]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\n      ,[Species_Group]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]\nWHERE [Species_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimSpeciesLkp
source(output(
		Data_Source_Id as integer,
		Metric_Short_Name as string,
		Source_Name as string,
		Source_Type as string,
		Source_Link as string,
		Source_Data_Type as string,
		Data_Process_Type as string,
		Source_Status as string,
		Frequency as string,
		Confidence_Level as string,
		Person_Responsible as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Data_Source_Id]\n      ,[Metric_Short_Name]\n      ,[Source_Name]\n      ,[Source_Type]\n      ,[Source_Link]\n      ,[Source_Data_Type]\n      ,[Data_Process_Type]\n      ,[Source_Status]\n      ,[Frequency]\n      ,[Confidence_Level]\n      ,[Person_Responsible]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Data_Source]\nWHERE [Data_Source_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDataSource
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Basis as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Type]\n      ,[Basis]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]\nWHERE [Type_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimTypePartial
source(output(
		Region_ID as integer,
		Country_Code as string,
		Country as string,
		Region_Code as string,
		Region as string,
		Port_Loc as string,
		Long as decimal(20,15),
		Lat as decimal(20,15)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Region_ID]\n      ,[Country_Code]\n      ,[Country]\n      ,[Region_Code]\n      ,[Region]\n      ,[Port_Loc]\n      ,[Long]\n      ,[Lat]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Region]\nWHERE [Region_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimRegion
source(output(
		Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Date]\nFROM [relational].[DateDimension]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDateDimension
source(output(
		UOM_ID as integer,
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string,
		UOM_Long_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [UOM_ID]\n      ,[UOM_Name]\n      ,[UOM_Desc]\n      ,[UOM_Type]\n      ,[UOM_Long_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_UOM]\nWHERE [UOM_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimUom
source(output(
		Delivery_Point_ID as integer,
		Deliver_Point_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Delivery_Point_Desc as string,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Delivery_Point_ID]\n      ,[Deliver_Point_Code]\n      ,[Delivery_Point]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Desc]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Long_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Delivery_Point]\nWHERE [Delivery_Point_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDeliveryPoint
source(output(
		Currency_ID as integer,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Currency_Name as string,
		Currency_Numeric_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Currency_ID]\n      ,[Currency_Code]\n      ,[Currency_Name]\n      ,[Currency_Numeric_Code]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Currency]\nWHERE [Currency_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimCurrency
source(output(
		Indicator_Id as integer,
		Indicator_Code as string,
		Indicator_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Indicator_Id]\n      ,[Indicator_Code]\n      ,[Indicator_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Indicator]\nWHERE [Indicator_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimIndicator
source(output(
		Type_ID as integer,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Type_ID]\n      ,[Type]\n      ,[Basis]\n      ,[Price_Point]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]\nWHERE [Type_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimType
FilterProcessGroup select(mapColumn(
		Product_Id_Lkp = Product_Id,
		Product_Code_Lkp = Product_Code,
		Product_Type_Lkp = Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp = Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Common_Name_Lkp = Product_Common_Name,
		Product_Desc_Lkp = Product_Desc,
		Product_Group_Lkp = Product_Group,
		GL_Code_Lkp = GL_Code,
		Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimProductLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName,
		{Period Date} = toDate({Period Date}),
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp = iifNull(Country, "Undefined"),
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp = iifNull(Region, "Undefined"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> DataTransformation
RenameDestinationPortAddDP split(not(isNull(DateDimension_Date_Lkp)) && 
not(isNull(Data_Source_Id_Lkp)) && 
( not(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp)) && equals({Species Common Name}, Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp) ) && 
( not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_CR)) || ( isNull(Region) && not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_CO)) ) ) && 
( not(isNull(Type_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Basis_Lkp)) ) && 


( isNull(Currency) || not(isNull(Currency_ID_Lkp)) ) && 
( isNull(UOM) || not(isNull(UOM_ID_Lkp)) ) && 
( isNull({Delivery Point}) || not(isNull(Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp)) ) &&
( isNull(Indicator) || not(isNull(Indicator_Id_Lkp))) &&
( (isNull({Origin Port Country}) && isNull({Origin Port Region}) && isNull({Origin Port})) || not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_OP)) ) &&
( (isNull({Destination Port Country}) && isNull({Destination Port Region}) && isNull({Destination Port})) || not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_DP)) ),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
DatamartDimSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_ID_Lkp = Species_ID,
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Genus_Lkp = Genus,
		Species_Lkp = Species,
		Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name,
		Species_Group_Lkp = Species_Group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
DataTransformation, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup({Species Common Name} == Species_Common_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimSpecies
LookupTypeDimensionPartial, SelectDimCurrencyLkp lookup(Currency == Currency_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimCurrency
DatamartDimDataSource select(mapColumn(
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp = Data_Source_Id,
		Metric_Short_Name_Lkp = Metric_Short_Name,
		Source_Name_Lkp = Source_Name,
		Source_Type_Lkp = Source_Type,
		Source_Link_Lkp = Source_Link,
		Source_Data_Type_Lkp = Source_Data_Type,
		Data_Process_Type_Lkp = Data_Process_Type,
		Source_Status_Lkp = Source_Status,
		Frequency_Lkp = Frequency,
		Confidence_Level_Lkp = Confidence_Level,
		Person_Responsible_Lkp = Person_Responsible
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDataSourceLkp
DatamartDimTypePartial select(mapColumn(
		Type_Lkp = Type,
		Basis_Lkp = Basis
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimTypePartialLkp
DatamartDimRegion select(mapColumn(
		Region_ID_Lkp = Region_ID,
		Country_Code_Lkp = Country_Code,
		Country_Lkp = Country,
		Region_Code_Lkp = Region_Code,
		Region_Lkp = Region,
		Port_Loc_Lkp = Port_Loc,
		Long_Lkp = Long,
		Lat_Lkp = Lat
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimRegionLkp
RelationalDateDimension select(mapColumn(
		DateDimension_Date_Lkp = Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDateDimensionLkp
DatamartDimUom select(mapColumn(
		UOM_ID_Lkp = UOM_ID,
		UOM_Name_Lkp = UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type_Lkp = UOM_Type,
		UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Long_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimUomLkp
DatamartDimDeliveryPoint select(mapColumn(
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp = Delivery_Point_ID,
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp = Deliver_Point_Code,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp = Delivery_Point,
		Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Desc,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Long_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDeliverPointLkp
DatamartDimCurrency select(mapColumn(
		Currency_ID_Lkp = Currency_ID,
		Currency_Code_Lkp = Currency_Code,
		Currency_Name_Lkp = Currency_Name,
		Currency_Numeric_Code_Lkp = Currency_Numeric_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimCurrencyLkp
DatamartDimIndicator select(mapColumn(
		Indicator_Id_Lkp = Indicator_Id,
		Indicator_Code_Lkp = Indicator_Code,
		Indicator_Desc_Lkp = Indicator_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimIndicatorLkp
LookupDimSpecies, SelectDimProductLkp lookup({Product Common Name} == Product_Common_Name_Lkp
	&& {Species Common Name} == Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimProduct
RenameRegionLkpAddCO, SelectDimDataSourceLkp lookup({Source Metric} == Metric_Short_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimDataSource
LookupDimDataSource, SelectDateDimensionLkp lookup({Period Date} == DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDateDimension
LookupDimCurrency, SelectDimUomLkp lookup(UOM == UOM_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimUom
LookupDimUom, SelectDimDeliverPointLkp lookup({Delivery Point} == Delivery_Point_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimDeliveryPoint
LookupDimDeliveryPoint, SelectDimIndicatorLkp lookup(Indicator == Indicator_Desc_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimIndicator
LookupDimProduct, SelectDimRegionLkp lookup(Country_Redefined_For_Lkp == Country_Lkp
	&& Region_Redefined_For_Lkp == Region_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimRegionUseCountryRegionKeys
RenameRegionLkpAddCR, SelectDimRegionLkp lookup(Country_Redefined_For_Lkp == Country_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimRegionUseCountryKey
LookupDimRegionUseCountryRegionKeys select(mapColumn(
		{Source Metric},
		{Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		{Species Common Name},
		{Product Common Name},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		{Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		{Origin Port Country},
		{Origin Port Region},
		{Origin Port},
		{Destination Port Country},
		{Destination Port Region},
		{Destination Port},
		{Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Species_Code_Lkp,
		Genus_Lkp,
		Species_Lkp,
		Species_Common_Name_Lkp,
		Species_Group_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Product_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Type_Lkp,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp,
		Product_Common_Name_Lkp,
		Product_Desc_Lkp,
		Product_Group_Lkp,
		GL_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CR = Region_ID_Lkp,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CR = Country_Code_Lkp,
		Country_Lkp_CR = Country_Lkp,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CR = Region_Code_Lkp,
		Region_Lkp_CR = Region_Lkp,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CR = Port_Loc_Lkp,
		Long_Lkp_CR = Long_Lkp,
		Lat_Lkp_CR = Lat_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameRegionLkpAddCR
LookupDimRegionUseCountryKey select(mapColumn(
		{Source Metric},
		{Period Date},

properties.description: NOTE:This DF only cater for INSERT. There is no Update to Expire for consideration The branch containing "UpdateSelectForExpire" kept for reference only

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT TRX.[Trx_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Code]\n      ,TRX.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n      ,TRX.[GL_Code]\n      ,CASE WHEN COA.GL_Code IS NOT NULL THEN COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] ELSE TRX.Cash_Flow_Code END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n      ,TRX.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Type]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Date]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Desc]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Amount]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0\n  WHERE TRX.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,TRX.Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly

	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '  SELECT CASE WHEN Trx_Desc = \'Beginning Balance:\' THEN CONCAT(TRX.[Trx_Code],\'-\',FUN.[Fund_ID]) ELSE Trx_Code END AS Trx_Code\n      ,FUN.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n	  ,TRX.GL_Code\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n	  ,CASE WHEN COA.[GL_Code] IS NULL THEN \'NO GL_CODE DURING LOAD\' ELSE COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n  FROM [staging].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.[GL_Code] = COA.[GL_Code] AND COA.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Fund] FUN\n  ON TRX.[Fund_ID] = FUN.[Company_Name] AND FUN.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Asset] ASS\n  ON TRX.[Asset_ID] = ASS.[Asset_ID] AND FUN.[Fund_ID] = ASS.[Fund_ID] AND ASS.[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,

		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,

	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		Entity as string,
		Category as string,
		Destination as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Share_Perpetual as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n --REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS REF_ASSET_OFFSET , PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS PAR_ASSET_OFFSET, PAR.DESC_YEAR, DAT.PERIOD,\n CASE WHEN REF.ASSET_OFFSET = PAR.ASSET_OFFSET \n          THEN DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n          ELSE DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)-CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n END AS Period_Date,\n REF.FUND_ID AS Fund_ID,\n REF.ASSET_ID AS Asset_ID,\n DAT.STATUS AS Status, \n DAT.PRODUCT AS Product, \n DAT.ENTITY AS Entity,\n DAT.CATEGORY AS Category,\n DAT.Destination AS Destination,\n CASE WHEN PRD.GL_CODE IS NULL THEN \'IGNORE\' ELSE PRD.GL_CODE END AS GL_Code,\n CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(100)) AS Cash_Flow_Code,\n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN CAST(CAST(DAT.PERPETUAL_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ELSE\n ABS(( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) )) END AS Perpetual_Amount,\n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) END AS Current_Amount, \n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) END AS Future_Amount,\n CAST(CAST(DAT.SHARE_PERPETUAL AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Share_Perpetual,\n CASE WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n      WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  WHEN COA.DEBIT_CREDIT IS NULL AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  ELSE \'CR\'\n END AS Debit_Credit,\n-- CASE WHEN ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\' ElSE \'CR\' END AS Debit_Credit,\n \'Forecast\' AS Forecast_Type,\n REF.VERSION_NAME AS Version_name,\n DAT.UOM\nFROM RELATIONAL.FORECAST_ASSET_REFERENCE REF\nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_PARAM PAR\nON REF.FUND_ID = PAR.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = PAR.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = PAR.VERSION_NAME \nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_DATA DAT\nON REF.FUND_ID = DAT.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = DAT.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = DAT.VERSION_NAME \nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.FORECAST_GL_PRODUCT_MAP PRD\nON DAT.FUND_ID = PRD.FUND_ID AND DAT.ASSET_ID = PRD.ASSET_ID AND DAT.STATUS = PRD.STATUS AND DAT.PRODUCT = PRD.Product AND PRD.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.CHART_OF_ACCOUNT COA\nON PRD.GL_CODE = COA.GL_CODE AND COA.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nWHERE REF.ISPROCESSED = 0 AND REF.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0 \nAND DAT.STATUS != \'\' AND DAT.STATUS IS NOT NULL\nAND CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) >= CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Share_Perpetual,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		UOM,

		Category,
		Destination
	),

		Destination as string,
		Category as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
